member.name: T:JackTheClipperData.ElasticController.ElasticDuplicateRemover
member.summary:
Removes duplicates we cant avoid (Example: Webpage:
Test with Regex //p + asyncness / Other example: Some Rss feeds increment the "Published" time after the article has been changed, but not the text) Based upon https://www.elastic.co/de/blog/how-to-find-and-remove-duplicate-documents-in-elasticsearch

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:JackTheClipperData.ElasticController.ElasticDuplicateRemover.GetAllDocumentsInIndex(Nest.IElasticClient)
member.summary: Gets all documents within elastic. Based upon http://telegraphrepaircompany.com/elasticsearch-nest-scroll-api-c/
member.returns: Enumerable of all articles within the ElasticSearch server.
